sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import './Form.css'; import axios from "axios"; class Form extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { Sportsman: [], userName: '', email: '', password: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', year: 0, month: 0, day: 0, height: 0, weight: 0, phoneNumber: '', level: '' } } componentDidMount() { axios.get("http://localhost:8080/sportsman/sign_up") .then((res)=>{ this.setState({ Sportsman: res.body, userName: '', email: '', password: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', year: 0, month: 0, day: 0, height: 0, weight: 0, phoneNumber: '', level: '' }) }) } submit(event,userName){ event.preventDefault(); if(userName!=''){ axios.put("http://localhost:8080/sportsman/sign_up",{ userName:this.state.userName, email:this.state.email, userName:this.state.userName, password:this.state.password, firstName:this.state.firstName, lastName:this.state.lastName, year:this.state.year, month:this.state.month, day:this.state.day, height:this.state.height, weight:this.state.weight, phoneNumber:this.state.phoneNumber, level:this.state.level, }).then(()=>{ this.componentDidMount(); }); } } render(){ return (
this.submit(e,this.state.userName)}>

Get started with us today! Create your account by filling out the information below.

this.setState({userName:e.target.value})} type="text">
this.setState({email:e.target.value})} type="text">
this.setState({password:e.target.value})} type="text">
this.setState({firstName:e.target.value})} type="text">
this.setState({lastName:e.target.value})} type="text">
this.setState({year:e.target.value})} type="number">
this.setState({month:e.target.value})} type="number">
this.setState({day:e.target.value})} type="number">
{/*
*/}
this.setState({height:e.target.value})} type="number">
this.setState({weight:e.target.value})} type="number">
this.setState({phoneNumber:e.target.value})} type="text">
this.setState({level:e.target.value})} type="text" id='level' name='level' className='form-input' placeholder="Enter your level (Beginner, Semi-Pro, Professional)" />
Want to sign up as a Coach? click here! here
); } } export default Form;
